title: Pups and Cups of ☕️ (Encore)
description:
In honor of Adopt A Dog Month, we’re revisiting the story of an incredible company with a mission. When Jordan Karcher was a kid he thought he’d grow up to become a veterinarian. He didn’t become a vet, but Jordan did find a creative way to combine two of his life’s passions — coffee and dogs.

Grounds & Hounds Coffee Co.

Follow Grounds & Hounds on Twitter or Instagram

Follow Yesika Salgado, our featured poet, on Instagram, Twitter, and online

Follow Da Poetry Lounge on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and online 

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
